title: Torches
desc: You can use torches to light your surroundings and prevent mobs spawning,
you can also use torches to break sand and gravel easily by placing it when they fall.

title: Trading
desc: The trading system is a gameplay mechanic that allows players
to trade principally emeralds for items and vice versa, with villagers and wandering traders.

title: Monsters
desc: Most monsters only come out at night. During the day you're safe... probably.

title: Crafting
desc: Break blocks, pick up resources. Use the crafting grid to make helpful items. Now you're crafting!

title: Survival
desc: You have endless lives, but your items drop to the ground when you die. Hurry back to pick them up!

title: Shelter
desc: It's a good idea to build a place where you can safely spend the night.

title: Tools
desc: Use the right tool for the job! Chopping wood with an axe is much faster than using your hands.

title: Hunger
desc: Even in Minecraft you'll get hungry, so try to find something to eat before that happens.

title: Mining
desc: Digging straight down or straight up might not be a great idea.

title: Monsters
desc: Monsters spawn in the dark. Craft a torch to brighten up any space.

title: Beds
desc: Beds are great! Craft one to quickly pass the night and set your respawn point.

title: Oxygen
desc: Be careful when you swim. Stay under water for too long and you'll run out of air.

title: Difficulty
desc: Survival mode has 4 different difficulty levels - Peaceful, Easy, Normal, and Hard.
Or play Creative mode and get endless resources!

title: Exploring
desc: The world of Minecraft is endlessly surprising. You'll find lots of different animals, plants.
